name: Deathstrike
script:
cecho("
<yellow:red>DEATHSTRIKE COMING FROM <blue:red>" .. matches[2] .. "!
<yellow:red>DEATHSTRIKE COMING FROM <blue:red>" .. matches[2] .. "!
<yellow:red>DEATHSTRIKE COMING FROM <blue:red>" .. matches[2] .. "!")
matches: ^Fists clenched, ([A-Z][a-z]+) focuses on you with a deadly look in (?:his|her) eyes\.$

^Leaping forwards with lightning speed, ([A-Z][a-z]+) strikes you in the chest with a single, powerful blow\. Its rhythm interrupted by (?:his|her) precise attack, your heartbeat begins to fluctuate erratically, a painful pressure building in your arteries\.$
